title: Hybrid Problem-Solving Project Based on Data Science

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic statistics and programming concepts, with experience in data analysis tools
context.additional_context: Emphasis on Self-Directed Problem-Solving Skills in COVID-19 Response Online Learning Environments, with Team Projects Utilizing Real-World Data

learning_goals: Learners can propose business problem-solving solutions by applying statistical analysis and visualization techniques to real-world datasets.
Learners can complete the entire project process—from data preprocessing to result interpretation—with team members using collaboration tools.
Learners can perform optimization processes to improve analytical model accuracy by over 20% based on formative assessment feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
